data.title: Nettwerk Records
data.meta_description: Wax Trax is a brick & mortar record store that has been in Denver’s Capitol Hill neighborhood since 1975. Wax Trax specializes in bringing the best in indepen
data.text:
Harmless - I'm Sure LP (10th anniversary)

In stock

•••••

Harmless is a colorful mix of emotions woven seamlessly with bright electronic synths, smooth vocals, and the occasional playful saxophone. Bedroom recording to the max

Geographer - Down and Out in the Garden of Earthly Delights 2LP (180g color vinyl)

In stock

•••••

Down and Out's creative strength is partially evident through its sheer volume. More significantly, however, it's how Geographer writes music that evokes emotional delight without clinging to just one compositional approach or chasing expectations.

McRae, Tate - The One Day LP LP (color vinyl)

In stock

•••••

Pressed on white-colored vinyl, Tate McRae's One Day marks the genesis of her emergence as a leading figure in contemporary pop music. This collection of 9 tracks encapsulates the core aspects of Tate’s distinctive songwriting and vocal artistry.

Vacations - No Place Like Home LP (green vinyl)

In stock

•••••

The new project follows an intense period of transformation for Campbell, who was forced to cancel all touring commitments due to COVID restrictions and subsequently came down with a severe bout of writer's block.

Skinny Puppy - Mind: The Perpetual Intercourse LP

In stock

•••••

Famous for both its pornographic album photo (the political backlash resulted in the Parental Advisory Label) and for inspiring the next generation of Industrial Music contemporaries (Nine Inch Nails) with tracks like “Dig It” and “Stairs and Flowers”.

Frances, Neil - There is no Neil Frances LP (180g clear vinyl)

In stock

•••••

There is no Neil Frances. OK, sort of. Neil Frances is not a solo artist, it's the name of a duo comprised of Sydney-born Jordan Feller and Southern California native Marc Gilfry.

Grizfolk - (self-titled) LP (140g)

In stock

•••••

Alternative rock foursome Grizfolk release their third studio album.. It includes a fan favorite from the band's live set, "The Ripple." Billboard describes the band's sound as "a little country, a Little Rock and a lot catchy."

Leisure - Leisurevision LP (color vinyl)

In stock

•••••

Auckland chilled soul-electronic collective LEISURE unveil their exquisite 4th studio album LEISUREVISION. Written and produced over the past 2 years in their home country of New Zealand.

Paper Kites, The - At the Roadhouse 2LP (180g color vinyl)

In stock

•••••

The song and production background began when the band created a roadhouse in rural Australia, performing an unannounced month-long residency in the small Victorian town of Campbells Creek, whilst working on their sixth record.

Paper Kites, The - Roses LP

In stock

•••••

'Roses' is the 5th studio album from The Paper Kites. An alluring, dynamic and diverse company, the 'Roses' vocalists were hand picked by the band to feature on the new album

Folick, Miya - Roach LP

In stock

•••••

Roach is Miya Folick's clearest and most direct work yet. With ear-worm melodies, heart-wrenching poetry, eclectic production and anchored by Folick's once-in-a-lifetime voice, Roach straddles a line between pop and something more experimental.

Bayonne - Temporary Time LP (electric blue vinyl)

In stock

•••••

Electric Blue Vinyl. Deeply informed by a deliberate transformation of his musical process, Bayonne's third full-length Temporary Time ultimately makes for his most expansive work to date-an album of both painfully raw introspection and otherworldly beaut

St. Lucia - Utopia 2LP (180g yellow/blue vinyl)

In stock

•••••

Led by husband-and-wife duo n Jean-Philip Grobler and Patti Beranek, the group retreat from a fractured world on fire and into the glow of a rapturous synth-spiked electro-pop catharsis-akin to a dance party at the edge of existence.
